ProcessDescription.ows:Title: ExtractValuesToPoints_sa
ProcessDescription.ows:Abstract: Extracts the cell values of a raster based on a set of points. Uses ArcObjects library - Spatial Analyst

Input.ows:Title: in point feature
Input.ows:Abstract: The input point features to which you want to add raster values.

Input.ows:Title: in raster
Input.ows:Abstract: The name of a raster dataset whose values you want to add to the input point features.

Input.ows:Title: interpolatie values
Input.ows:Abstract: Specifies whether or not interpolation will be used. NONE — No interpolation will be applied; the value of the cell center will be used. INTERPOLATE — The value of the cell will be calculated from the adjacent cells with valid values using bilinear interpolation. NoData values will be ignored in the interpolation unless all adjacent cells are NoData.

Input.ows:Title: interpolation as boolean
Input.ows:Abstract: Determines if the raster attributes are written to the output point feature dataset. VALUE_ONLY — Only the value of the input raster is added to the point attributes. This is the default. ALL — All the fields from the input raster (except Count) will be added to the point attributes.

Output.ows:Title: out point feature
Output.ows:Abstract: The output point feature dataset containing the extracted raster values.
